about.bio: I am Aryan Bansal, a Software Engineer working with C/C++. I enjoy creating products for fun and have a good knowledge of Python. Through this website, I want to share my work and blog about what I learn every day.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
description: Contributing to the Linux kernel for Android development.
Implementing control groups to efficiently manage memory resources for devices.

experiences.title: Intern - MODEM PHY Team
description: Developed a log analysis program with Excel-like tables, color-coded logs, filtering, and error plots.
Optimized log processing with WxPython, enabling stress testing and efficient filtering for large log files.

experiences.title: Research Assistant
description: Developed a solution for analyzing options derivatives based on expiration, VWAP, and IV, achieving a 21% return.
Applied time-series analysis and optimized LSTM models for algorithmic trading, reducing the error rate to 0.4%.

projects.name: Portfolio Website

projects.name: RedditReels Generator
projects.description: Developed a CLI tool to generate and post short-form content by scraping Reddit posts. Utilized Python, Flask, and OpenAI APIs for TTS generation and Whisper for text-audio syncing. Integrated video overlay, text alignment, and audio synchronization, successfully posting to Instagram and YouTube. Currently expanding with a frontend for broader accessibility.

projects.name: BroCode
projects.description: Developed a CLI tool for Competitive Programming, integrating the Codeforces API to sync problems with GitHub profiles. Built a problem recommendation algorithm based on user profiles, streamlining personalized practice.
